title: How To Get Ip Boost?
body: Hi, i was playing league of legends and a 4 win IP boost if i confirmed my email popped up. As i always do i clicked x thinking that it would pop up again, unfortunately it did not. Can somebody help me out? thanks.

replies.body: If you need help verifying your email check this [link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751744-Email-Verification-FAQ).
Thank you so much! I was able to verify the email and i got the ip boost! This will help me out when i grind out for those 6k champs!

You can confirm your email after requesting a verification email from [**this link**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect), then checking your email to confirm your email address is valid.

Let me know if you have any questions.
